note:
This is a Friendica group dedicated to #Fediverse news. What are the advantages of a group over a hashtag?

This is an actively moderated group. Be sure to stay on topic, or your posts will be removed. To report any post that's offensive or goes off topic, send a direct message to @atomicpoet@atomicpoet.org.

Remember, you don't even need to be a Friendica user to participate. Because Friendica is part of the Fediverse, this group is available to everyone -- including people who use Mastodon!
